ComicInfo.Title: Moment of Decision!; The Ultimate Weapon!; Bug in the Works; DEF
ComicInfo.Summary:
Contains:
Moment of Decision!
Plop Drop
Devilish Plops
The Ultimate Weapon
Bug in the Works
People Plops
Historical Plops
Plopular Poetry
The three hosts throw themselves in front of a truck so that they have a captive audience of doctors, nurses, and observers to tell stories to.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-16 10:23:45. [CVDB56599]
ComicInfo.Writer: Arnold Drake, Steve Skeates, Michael Pellowski, Wally Wood, David Michelinie, Sergio Aragonés
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bill Draut, Frank Thorne, David Manak, Wally Wood, Bill Draut, Dave Manak, Frank Thorne, Sergio Aragonés, Wally Wood
ComicInfo.Inker: Bill Draut, Frank Thorne, David Manak, Wally Wood, Bill Draut, Dave Manak, Frank Thorne, Sergio Aragonés, Wally Wood
ComicInfo.Characters: Abel, Cain, Eve, Henry Kissinger, Richard Nixon
